Incident Task: What is the purpose of the application?
Incident Fact: This is a new trading application for processing high volume, automated transactions

Incident Task: What data does it create, store, process and / or transmit?
Who is the technical support lead?
Incident Fact: There is no single accountable lead for technical support and question triage in the team in the event of a security incident

Incident Task: Who is the business owner?
Incident Fact: Peter Smith, who runs Special Projects

Incident Task: What access logs are available (going back how long)?
Incident Fact: User access logs could not be accessed for 5 hours

Incident Task: What user activity logs are available (going back how long)?
Incident Fact: There are no activity logs available for the application

Incident Task: Who manages JML processes?
Incident Fact: There is no formal JML process and accounts are disabled, not removed

Incident Task: What is the process for back ups?
Incident Fact: Code is only backed up locally to developer laptops

Incident Task: Is the system licenced from or managed by a 3rd party?
Incident Fact: No, this application has been built in-house.
Timeline Fact: 2019.07.31 // 17:30 // Security informed by NLigos there is no 3rd party access to this application

Incident Task: Is the system licenced from or managed by a 3rd party?
Incident Fact: No formal security code review has been performed

Incident Task: What is the finanial impact of the applicaiton being offilne?
Incident Fact: Compromise of availability or integrity can cost upwards of $1M a day, minimum

Incident Task: Does any customer PII touch the system?
Incident Fact: No

Incident Task: Who is the relevant contact in Legal for regulatory reporting?
Incident Fact: There is no full time Data Protection Officer; this is outsourced to Smithers & Waylon LLP

Incident Task: How many users have access to the system?
Incident Fact: 6 users have access. Peter Smith ; Alan Lee ; Bruno Lyon ; Alan Champion ; Peter Smith ; Norman Ligos.

Incident Task: Are any credentials shared?
Is 2FA enforced?
Incident Fact: 2FA is enforced for all users except ALee.

Incident Task: Does the applicaiton have an authentication gateway for remote users?
Incident Fact: There is no authentication gateway (e.g. VPN, SSO) for this applicaiton

Incident Task: What alerts are available on user devices from prevention / detection technologies?
Incident Fact: Laptops used for this project only have standard AV installed

Incident Task: Does any 3rd party have legitimate access to the system and how are their actions logged?
Incident Fact: No; no third parties have been involved in development or admin of this system

Incident Task: What are the possible causes of compromise that need investigation?
Incident Fact: Current investigation is focused: account compromise of legitimate user ; malware ; malicious employee

Incident Task: Are there any other apps that should be in scope for investigation?
Are credentials used to access the Sunways application used for any other critical or sensitive apps?
Incident Fact: No, there is an off-grid email domain that is used exclusively to gain access to this system.

Incident Task: Is there any evidence that encryption or API keys have been compromised?
Incident Fact: API keys are stored in plain text on user devices

Incident Task: Has a passoword re-set been actioned for all system users?
Incident Fact: Password re-sets for Sunways need to be done manually, one by one, by an admin user

Incident Task: Has a passoword re-set been actioned for all system users?
Incident Fact: Admin accounts for Sunways are shared across users

Incident Task: Has 2FA been enforced for all users?

Incident Task: When was the incident discovered?
Timeline Fact: 2019.07.31 // 16:59 // Code deletion reported to Security by Norman Ligos

Investigation Thread: Establish the timeline for the incident
Incident Task: Who discovered the incident?
Incident Fact: Norman Ligos discovered the incident

Investigation Thread: Establish the timeline for the incident
Incident Task: What are the findings from investigation of Digicorp email access logs?
Incident Fact: Several user accounts have logs that suggest failed brute force attacks. ALee has the same pattern, followed by a login they do not recognise.

Investigation Thread: Establish the timeline for the incident
Incident Task: What are the findings from investigation of Digicorp email access logs?
Incident Fact: Several user accounts have logs that suggest failed brute force attacks. ALee has the same pattern, followed by a login they do not recognise.
Timeline Fact: 2019.06.12 // 03:24 // ALee account has 7 failed logins and then a login from IP external to Digicorp

Investigation Thread: Establish the timeline for the incident
Incident Task: What are the findings from investigation of Sunways email access logs?
Incident Fact: ALee has a Sunways login followed by a password change shortly after the successful unrecognised login to his Digicorp address
Timeline Fact: 2019.06.12 // 04:10 // ALee account has login, immediately followed by passowrd change

Incident Task: What are the findings from investigation of Digicorp email access logs?
Incident Fact: 2FA was enforced for all users except ALee, who was not enrolled.
Timeline Fact: 2019.08.01 // 01:23 // ALee advises the login at 03:24 was not him

Incident Task: What does an investigation of ALee's Digicorp inbox show about possible route of compromise?
Incident Fact: ALee stores credentials for multiple systems in the draft folder

Incident Task: Are there any detections for malware or hacking on the devices owned by Sunways users?
Incident Fact: There are multiple detecitons for adware, malware, process execution and evasion techniques

Incident Task: Are there any detections for malware or hacking on the devices owned by Sunways users?
What are the findings from investigation of Sunways email access logs?
Incident Fact: 2FA has not been set up by the owner of the digi-inc.com email domain

Investigation Thread: Establish if this could be connected to the recent uptick in malware detections
